name: Stavlarus
short_description:
This is a .NET C# text based RPG in planning stages, and engine development stages. We only provide commits at this time due to the current instability of the product.

WARNING:
The current state of the product may have broken, boring, or no gameplay.

Please use Visual C# 2008 Express or MonoDevelop and compile the code. we do not support ANY binary releases at the current time
